job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of building and integrating AI capabilities into a complete software product, encompassing both front-end and back-end development and full product ownership, which aligns with traditional software engineering tasks augmented by AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the architectural and coding responsibilities for full-stack web applications, specifically mentioning the integration of AI to improve user experience, fitting the definition of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to working with specific generative AI models (LLMs) and developing AI-powered features, which falls under the specialization of AI model development and application.

job_tasks.phrase: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end responsibility for technical projects, including requirements, development, launch, and iteration, which is a key aspect of software development lifecycle management.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase emphasizes aligning technical AI solutions with specific business goals (accelerating learning outcomes, efficiency) and user needs (human-centered), reflecting business understanding and strategic alignment.

soft_skills.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product
communicate complex ideas simply and effectively
continually learning and applying the latest advancements

profile.rationale: The job advertisement describes a role that requires a balanced mix of core software engineering tasks (integrating AI across front-end and back-end, owning the entire development process) and specific Generative AI tasks (working with LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude to create AI features). The emphasis on building full-stack applications that leverage GenAI, rather than solely focusing on model development or traditional software engineering without AI, aligns with the definition of a Core GenAI Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and specific about the responsibilities, the type of AI technologies involved (LLMs), and the expectation of integrating these into full-stack applications. The 'what you will NOT be doing' section further clarifies the scope, leaving little room for ambiguity.
